about_the_game:
Enjoy a total of 13 new paint schemes, including some from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series and NASCAR XFINITY Series. This pack features schemes of drivers like Chase Elliott, Dale Earnhardt, Jr., Justin Allgaier, and Daniel Hemric.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Chase Elliott #24 NAPA Brakes Chevrolet (Richmond)
Dale Earnhardt Jr. #88 Axalta Chevrolet (Sonoma)
Kasey Kahne #5 AARP Drive to End Hunger Chevrolet (Richmond)
…

NXS:
Justin Allgaier #7 Cessna / Beechcraft Chevrolet (Dover)
Bubba Wallace #6 GlobeLife Ford (Talladega)

This content is also included in the 2017 Hot Pass!

name: NASCAR Heat 2 - November Value Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better

esrb.descriptors: Online Interactions not Rated by ESRB
